description.en:
Collections of short ecchi comedy comics posted on Twitter/X.

+++ **Volume 1 Contents:**
1) Marie to Natsu no Umi (マリエと夏の海 , Marie and the Summer Sea)
2) Tonkagya-san de no Manner (とんかっ屋さんでのマナー , Etiquette at a Tonkatsu Restaurant)
3) 〇〇 nao Nee-san (〇〇なお姉さん , 〇〇 Big Sister)
4) 〇〇 na Present (〇〇なプレゼント , 〇〇 Present)
5) Himitsu no Are (秘密のアレ , That's a Secret)
6) Tatoerunara (例えるなら , For Example)
7) Succubus Moriko-chan (1) (サキュバス モリ子ちゃん)
8) Succubus Moriko-chan (2) (サキュバス モリ子ちゃん)
9) Koushoujin Mashike Masaomi (交渉人 増毛正臣 , The Negotiator, Masaomi Mashike)
10) Pierce no Okayama-san (1) (ピアスの岡山さん , Pierced Okayama-san)
11) Pierce no Okayama-san (2) (ピアスの岡山さん , Pierced Okayama-san)
12) Ichiko to Maya (イチコとマヤ , Ichiko and Maya)
13) Toshishita no Otokonoko ni Are Shichau Hanashi (年下の男の子にアレしちゃう話 , Falling in Love with a Younger Boy)
14) Otsupai Undermining Kouka (おつぱいアンダーマイニング効果 , The Boob Undermining Effect)
15) Katei Kyoushi no JK ga Usugi (家庭教師のJKが薄着 , The High School Private Tutor is Dressed Lightly)
16) Chuu-2 Danshi no Nichijou (中2男子の日常 , Daily Life of a Junior High School Second Year Student)
17) Fumio to Masashi (フ三オとマサシ , Fumio and Masashi)
18) Bouken Otomesan A-chan (冒険乙女三アちゃん , Adventure Maiden Mia-chan)
19) Serizawa-san no Houkago (芹沢さんの放課後 , After School with Serizawa-san)
+++
+++ **Volume 2 Contents:**
1) Battle Manga Couple Niari-Gachina Asa no Koukei (バトル漫画カップルにありがちな朝の光景 , Morning Routine of Couples in Action Manga)
2) Enkaku no Are (遠隔のアレ , Remote That)
3) Tensai Planner Kyouko (天才プランナー京子 , Genius Player Kyouko)
4) Valentine Hunter Matsuzaki (バレンタインハンター松崎)
5) Are no Namae (アレの名前 , The Name of That)
6) Awanai Futari (あわないふたり)
7) Itsudemo Dokodemo Hata-chan (いつでもどこでも八田ちゃん , Anytime and Anywhere, Hatta-chan)
8) Do Seiso Moeri-chan (ド清楚もえりちゃん , Super Tidy Moeri-chan)
9) Isekai Janakute Iikara Kouiu Kankyou ni Tensei Shitai dake no Manga (異世界じゃなくていいからこういう環境に転生したいだけの漫画 , It's Fine if it isn't an Isekai, I Just Want to be Reborn in an Environment Like This)
10) Himetaru Omoi (秘めたる想い , Hidden Thoughts)
11) Asa no Misaki-senpai (朝の美咲先輩 , Miki-senpai in the Morning)
12) Okayama-san no Himitsu (岡山さんの秘密 , Okayama-san's Secret)
13) Jiman no Kanojo (自慢の彼女 , The Girlfriend I'm Proud Of)
14) Kanashibari no Jutsu (金縛りの術 , Kanashibari Technique)
15) Aruhara Kara Hajimaru Are (アルハラから始まるアレ , That, Started After Drink Pushing)
16) Himetaru Omoi (秘めたる想い , Hidden Love)
17) Okaasan no Toutta Koukou (お母さんの通った高校 , The High School Mom Went To)
18) Tada ni Bou Gu (多田に棒ぐ , An Oddering to Tada)
19) Sakusha no Toaru Yoru no Nikki (作者のとある夜の日記 , The Creator's Journal Entry of a Certain Night)

title.en: Watashi yori Tsuyoi Otoko to Kekkon shitai no - Seiso na Biji Seito Kaichou (Jitsu wa Moto Banchou) no Himitsu wo Shiru Inkya (Jitsu wa Kanojo wo Koeru Saikyou no Yankee)

altTitles.ja: 私より強い男と結婚したいの 清楚な美人生徒会長（実は元番長）の秘密を知る陰キャ（実は彼女を超える最強のヤンキー）

altTitles.en: I Want to Marry a Man Stronger Than Me!

description.en: Akira Kogure, an introverted loner high-school student befriends the student council president Shizuka Takasaki, who excels in both academics and athletics, blessed with beautiful looks from birth. Though their relationship may seem to be normal, both are keeping a secret that they can't reveal to anyone?!
description.ja: 文武両道・才色兼備の生徒会長、高崎雫花（シズカ）。ひょんなことで彼女と仲良くなった、陰キャぼっちの高校生・小暮秋良（アキラ）は、彼女が伝説の女番長だったことを知ってしまう。番長をやっていた理由を尋ねるアキラに、シズカが答えた理由は……「私ねーー私より強い男と結婚したいの」。実はそのアキラこそ、彼女を超える最強の男だったーー!?
description.pt-br: Akira Kogure, um estudante introvertido e solitário do ensino médio, faz amizade com o presidente do conselho estudantil, Shizuka Takasaki, que se destaca tanto nos estudos quanto no atletismo, abençoado com uma bela aparência desde o nascimento. Embora o relacionamento deles possa parecer normal, ambos guardam um segredo que não podem revelar a ninguém?!

links.cdj: https://www.cdjapan.co.jp/searchuni?fq.category=UD:14&q=私より強い男と結婚したいの&order=reldesc&opt.exclude_prx=on

description.en:
Collections, in no particular order, of super short comics posted by author Hamita on Twitter/X and pixiv. The short story collections mainly include romcom and boy meets girl, but also include various genres such as scifi, gag, and suspense.

## Volume 1
1. An Imperfect Woman
2. Different Kind Of Different Kind
3. My Girlfriend Isn't Cute
4. Image Frequency
5. A Salesman Who Sells Greed
6. Maid Makeshift
7. A Goddess Without Inconvenience
8. One-Night-Only Passingman
9. Overhumankind's Planet

## Volume 2
10. Persistent Sports Girl
11. Misdelivered Love Letter
12. The Person Who Filled My Heart
13. A Beauty Soft And Fluffy In All Directions
14. The Apathetic Maid's Mismanagement
15. A Cold Senior And Warm Junior
16. The Ideal Cool Girl Who Is Only Kind To Herself
17. Duplicity And A Laughingstock
18. Robot And Landscape Painting

## Volume 3
19. The Soft-Spoken Conveni Clerk
20. A Girl Who Grasped A Secret
21. A Girlfriend Who Wants To Make Meals
22. I Want To Quit Being A Demon
23. A Bad Girl's Bag Inspection
24. Otherworldly Civilization
25. I Like Beauties Even With Bad Personalities
26. Counselor
27. The Transfer Student Ranked First In The Year
28. A Literature Girl Who's Kind To Geeks But Strict Only With Me

title.en: Tadaima, Honey ~Kanojo to Boku no, Himitsu no 2%~

altTitles.ja: ただいま、ハニー　～彼女と僕の、秘密の2％～

description.en:
Nanako is an office worker who has suddenly become a sex friend of Ayato, a popular celebrity.
She was supposed to be one of the convenient women for Ayato, but he fell in love with Nanako, who has a mysterious atmosphere.
What is the "secret" that Nanako confides to Ayato, who gradually becomes infatuated with her?

links.amz: https://www.amazon.co.jp/ただいま、ハニー-～彼女と僕の、秘密の2％～（１）-魔法のiらんどコミックス-水埜-なつ-ebook/dp/B08WCBQZS5

title.en: Tomurai no Hana to Himitsu no Kanojo

altTitles.ja: 弔いの花とヒミツの彼女

altTitles.ja-ro: Tomurai no Hana to Himitsu no Kanojo

description.en:
"I am a reporter and she is an actress. But we were friends until that day...” 
Haruka, who works as a reporter for a gossip magazine, had promised Ibuki, an actress and a friend since high school, that they would go to a southern island together when they were finished with their work, but... Haruka hears the news of Ibuki's sudden death. 
On the night of the funeral, Haruka is grieving when she happens to meet Oga, a former detective, at a restaurant she visits. Haruka, who had doubts about Ibuki's death, decides to take action to uncover the truth of the case with the help of the former detective... 
Can the two get to the bottom of Ibuki's death? A thrilling story of a reporter and an ex-detective closing in on the dark side of the case.
